title: Please help me by filling this form
selftext:
Greetings! I'm conducting a survey to understand the impact of user perception, trust in payment systems, and experience of online fraud on the choice of mode of payment as a part of my multidisciplinary studies(MDS) course assignment. The data collected in this form will be used for academic research purposes only, and no personal identification of any sort will be asked. This questionnaire will take approximately 5-10 minutes to complete.

Link of the survey form: [https://forms.gle/Jfo9DoLsiZ7Zpmpt7](https://forms.gle/Jfo9DoLsiZ7Zpmpt7)

Your contribution to this study would be highly valued. Thank you and have a great day!
